name: anytype
title: Anytype
description: Create, browse and search in Anytype - right at your fingertips, anywhere on your Mac
author: jmetrikat

commands.name: browse-spaces
commands.title: Browse Spaces
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Browse your spaces one by one.

commands.name: search-anytype
commands.title: Search Anytype
commands.subtitle: Anytype
commands.description: Search objects globally in all spaces.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
